page.title: 06CUSTOMS
page.content: Kineton's annual customs tend to be remembered in the latter part of the year. At the begining of September gardeners, allotment holders and hobbyists meet in the Village Hall for the{Produce Show. { The{Mop Fair}now takes place on the nearest Saturday to the traditional date of 2nd October. Originally the time for hiring labourers and servants It is now a highlight of the children's year, excitment rises with the arrival of the vans in the Market Square outside the Infant school and bubbles as they are allowed to have a go on the sideshows, slot machines and solitary roundabout.
